info.title: Order Management System API
info.description: Auto-generated OpenAPI spec from tRPC routes with OpenAPI metadata

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password
Register a new admin user

get.description: Get current authenticated user information

post.description: Refresh authentication token
Logout current user

get.description: Get comprehensive dashboard statistics for the specified period.
Get revenue analytics with breakdown by time period.
Get order analytics with optional grouping.
Get customer analytics with different breakdown options.
Get inventory analytics with optional warehouse filtering.
Get comprehensive order analytics for reporting purposes.
Get order statistics for dashboard display.
Get a list of regulatory compliance alerts with filters

post.description: Create a new regulatory compliance alert

get.description: Get comprehensive compliance dashboard data and metrics

put.description: Update compliance alert status and resolution
Update cylinder compliance status and dates

post.description: Generate compliance alerts for overdue cylinders

get.description: Get report of cylinders with overdue compliance requirements
Get a paginated list of customers with optional filtering and search

post.description: Create a new customer with address information

get.description: Get a single customer by their ID

delete.description: Delete a customer and all associated data

put.description: Update customer information and optionally their address

get.description: Get paginated order history for a specific customer
Get analytics and statistics for a specific customer

post.description: Validate customer information for duplicates and business rules
Check if additional deposit would exceed customer limit

put.description: Set or update customer deposit limit and alert preferences

get.description: Get comprehensive deposit exposure analysis for customer
Get all addresses for a specific customer

post.description: Add a new address for a customer

put.description: Update an existing address

post.description: Set an address as the primary address for a customer
Get latitude and longitude coordinates for an address
Validate address format and existence through geocoding
Validate delivery window times against business rules
Process a delivery or pickup operation with items and location data
Mark a delivery or pickup as completed with optional signature and photo proof

get.description: Get a paginated list of deliveries with optional filtering
Get a paginated list of pickups with optional filtering
Get the current cylinder balance for a customer
Get detailed information about a specific delivery including items
Get detailed information about a specific pickup including items
Get paginated transaction history for a customer with optional filtering
Get a list of empty return credits with filters
Get summary of pending empty returns by customer

post.description: Process the return of empty cylinders with enhanced damage and loss tracking
Cancel an empty return credit (charge deposit to customer)
Automatically expire and charge deposits for overdue empty returns

get.description: Get cross-brand cylinder exchange report and reconciliation status

post.description: Update the reconciliation status for cross-brand cylinder exchanges

get.description: Get inventory balance with advanced filtering, stock level analysis, and business intelligence. Supports filtering by warehouse, product, stock levels, and search terms.
Retrieve all inventory records for a specific warehouse with product details.
Retrieve inventory records for a specific product across all warehouses.
Get basic inventory statistics including totals and low stock counts. Optionally filter by warehouse.

post.description: Adjust the quantity of full and empty cylinders in inventory with business rule validation and audit trail.
Transfer inventory between warehouses with full validation and atomicity. Creates destination inventory if it doesn't exist.
Create a new inventory balance record for a specific product and warehouse.
Reserve a specified quantity of inventory for an order. This is idempotent, meaning it can be called multiple times with the same result.

get.description: Retrieve a list of recent stock movements (inventory adjustments, transfers, etc.) across all warehouses.

post.description: Validate if a proposed stock adjustment would violate any business rules (e.g., negative stock, insufficient reserved stock, large adjustments, pending transfers).

get.summary: Get low stock items with intelligent thresholds
get.description: Retrieve a list of products that are low on stock, considering their projected availability and urgency levels.

post.summary: Check product availability with business rules
post.description: Validate if a requested quantity of products is available across warehouses, considering delivery dates and priority.
Add stock/receive inventory with supplier, truck, driver, receipt date, notes, and multiple products.

get.description: Get a list of receipt transactions.

post.description: Initiate a transfer between warehouses, moving stock to In Transit status.
Complete a warehouse transfer by receiving stock at destination.
Create a cycle count for periodic inventory verification with variance tracking.

get.description: Get a list of cycle count transactions.

post.description: Record a payment for an order with comprehensive validation and automatic order status updates. Supports Cash, Mpesa, and Card payments. For Mpesa payments, initiates STK push. For Cash/Card payments, immediately processes and may update order status to "paid" if full payment is received.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of payments with comprehensive filtering options including date ranges, amounts, payment methods, and status.

post.description: Initiate a Mpesa payment for an order and return payment details for customer confirmation.

get.description: Get comprehensive payment statistics including totals by status, payment method, and time periods with optional filtering.
Retrieve orders that have overdue payments with urgency levels and detailed customer information for collections.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific payment including associated order and customer details.
Retrieve all payments for a specific order with optional payment summary including balance calculations.

put.description: Update the status of a payment (pending, completed, failed, refunded) with optional transaction details and notes.

post.description: Manually trigger status check for a specific checkout request to verify payment status

get.description: Retrieve a comprehensive list of products with advanced filtering, inventory data, and business intelligence including popularity and compliance scores.

post.description: Create a new parent product. Use createVariant endpoint for creating product variants.

get.description: Retrieve simplified product data for use in dropdowns and selection components.
Get basic statistics about products
Get the standard cylinder variants (full/empty) used in the system.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific product by its ID.

put.description: Update an existing product with new information. Validates SKU uniqueness and business rules.

delete.description: Soft delete a product or parent product by setting its status to obsolete. When deleting a parent product, all child products are automatically made obsolete.

put.description: Update an existing parent product with new information.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific parent product by its ID.

put.description: Update a product variant. SKU and barcode_uid cannot be changed - they remain unchanged for data integrity.

post.description: Update the status of multiple products individually with detailed success/error tracking. Handles both regular products and parent products. When marking products as obsolete, checks for inventory and handles child products.
Reactivate a previously obsoleted product or parent product by setting its status to active. When reactivating a parent product, all child products are automatically reactivated.
Validate product data including SKU uniqueness and name similarity checks.
Validate cylinder capacity and tare weight constraints with business rule validation.
Calculate inventory movements based on order type and line items for delivery, refill, exchange, and pickup orders.

post.summary: Calculate exchange quantity for order types
post.description: Calculate the appropriate exchange quantity based on order type (refill/exchange).

get.description: Retrieve products grouped by parent-child relationships with their variants.

post.description: Create a new parent product that can have variants.

get.summary: List parent products with variant counts
get.description: Get a list of parent products with their variant counts.
Get the available SKU variant types for product variants.
Generate inventory valuation report showing FULL vs EMPTY cylinder counts with standard costs and total valuations by warehouse and product
Generate deposit analysis report showing outstanding deposits per customer with aging buckets, deposit liability totals, and threshold warnings
Generate margin analysis report showing revenue by order type (FULL-OUT vs FULL-XCH), gas fill costs vs cylinder handling costs, and profitability metrics
Generate operational KPIs report showing empty cylinder return rates, average days to return, deposit liability trends, and lost cylinder tracking
Get key metrics summary for the reports dashboard including stock valuation, deposit liability, return rates, and margin highlights
Retrieve a list of accessories with filtering and pagination.

post.description: Create a new accessory item.

get.description: Retrieve a specific accessory by its ID.

put.description: Update an existing accessory item.

get.description: Retrieve statistics about accessories.
Retrieve accessory options for dropdowns and selections.
Retrieve all accessory categories.

post.description: Create a new accessory category.

put.description: Update an existing accessory category.

post.description: Update the status of multiple accessories at once.
Validate accessory data before creation or update.
Validate accessory SKU format and uniqueness.

get.summary: List transfers with filtering and pagination
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of transfers with filtering options including source/destination warehouses, status, dates, and search text.

post.description: Create a new inventory transfer between warehouses with validation and automatic reference generation.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific transfer including all items and warehouse details.

post.description: Validate a transfer request including inventory availability, warehouse capacity, and business rules. Uses atomic validation for single items and enhanced validation for multi-item transfers.
Update the status of a transfer with validation and automatic inventory updates upon completion.

get.summary: Get warehouse stock for transfer planning
get.description: Retrieve warehouse stock information filtered by product types and availability for transfer planning purposes.
Calculate comprehensive cost analysis for a transfer including handling, transport costs, and efficiency metrics.
Search and filter products available for transfer by variant type, warehouse, and text search.

post.description: Perform comprehensive validation for multi-SKU transfers with enhanced business logic and conflict detection.
Calculate detailed information for transfer items including weights, costs, and validation status.
Validate if the destination warehouse has sufficient capacity for the proposed transfer.
Validate if sufficient inventory is available at the source warehouse for the transfer.
Check for potential conflicts with existing transfers on the same date and warehouse.
Calculate estimated duration for transfer completion including preparation, loading, transport, and unloading time.
Format validation errors into user-friendly display format with categorization.

get.summary: List trucks with filtering and pagination
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of trucks with optional filtering by search text, status, and active state. Includes inventory data for each truck.

post.description: Create a new truck with fleet information, capacity details, and driver assignment.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific truck including current inventory, route information, and capacity calculations.

put.description: Update truck details including fleet number, capacity, driver information, and maintenance schedules.

delete.description: Delete a truck from the fleet. This action cannot be undone.

get.description: Retrieve truck allocations for a specific date and/or truck with order assignments and capacity information.

post.description: Assign an order to a specific truck with estimated weight and delivery sequence information.

put.description: Update the status or sequence of an existing truck allocation.

get.description: Retrieve planned and actual routes for trucks on a specific date with timing and distance information.

post.description: Create a new route plan for a truck with scheduled times and distance estimates.

put.description: Update route information with actual times, status changes, and fuel consumption data.

get.description: Retrieve maintenance records for trucks with scheduling, completion status, and cost information.

post.description: Schedule maintenance for a truck with type, date, description, and mechanic assignment.

put.description: Update maintenance record with completion status, actual costs, and mechanic notes.

post.description: Calculate the total weight of an order for truck capacity planning and allocation decisions.

get.description: Calculate current capacity utilization for a truck on a specific date including existing allocations.

post.description: Find the most suitable truck for an order based on capacity, efficiency, and utilization optimization.
Validate if a specific truck can accommodate an order considering capacity constraints and existing allocations.
Optimize truck allocations for multiple orders to maximize efficiency and minimize costs.
Validate if a truck can accommodate the specified items without exceeding capacity constraints.
Load inventory from warehouse to truck with atomic transfer validation and comprehensive logging.
Unload inventory from truck to warehouse with transfer validation and tracking.

get.description: Retrieve current inventory status for a truck with capacity utilization and product details.
Get paginated list of trips with optional filtering and sorting
Get basic information about a specific trip
Get chronological timeline of trip events and status changes
Get detailed capacity utilization and loading information for a trip

post.description: Create a new trip for a truck with basic route information

get.description: Get a paginated list of trips with optional filtering

put.description: Update trip details including truck, route, driver, and timing information

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific trip including loading details and variance records

put.description: Update the status of a trip and track lifecycle timestamps

post.description: Allocate multiple confirmed orders to a trip and change their status to dispatched

delete.description: Remove an order allocation from a trip

get.summary: Get confirmed orders available for trip assignment
get.description: Retrieve all confirmed orders that can be assigned to trips

post.description: Begin the loading process for a trip and transition status to unloaded
Record actual loaded quantities for products on a trip with inventory transfer

get.description: Get comprehensive loading summary with Required vs Loaded comparison

post.description: Complete the loading process with capacity validation and status transition

get.description: Get detailed warnings about products that are short-loaded with impact analysis

post.description: Validate that the planned loading quantities for a trip do not exceed truck capacity

post.summary: Check product availability for trip loading
post.description: Check warehouse inventory availability for products required by trip orders

get.summary: List warehouses with filtering and pagination
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of warehouses with optional search filtering and address information.

post.description: Create a new warehouse with optional address information and capacity details.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific warehouse including address details.

put.description: Update warehouse information including name, capacity, and address details.

delete.description: Delete a warehouse after validating that it has no associated inventory, trucks, or orders.

get.description: Retrieve aggregate statistics about warehouses including total count and capacity information.
Retrieve simplified warehouse information suitable for dropdown lists and selection components.
Retrieve a paginated list of orders with comprehensive filtering options, business logic calculations, and optional analytics.

post.description: Create a new order with comprehensive validation including pricing, inventory, customer status, and business rules.

get.description: Retrieve the complete order workflow with status definitions and transition rules.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific order including customer, address, order lines, and payment information.

put.description: Update order details including customer, address, products, and delivery information

post.description: Calculate the total amount for an order including tax calculations and line item breakdowns.
Update order status with inventory management, business rule validation, and automated workflows.
Update the tax percentage for an order and recalculate totals.
Allocate an order to a specific truck for delivery with capacity validation.

post.summary: Convert visit order to delivery order
post.description: Convert a visit order to a delivery order by adding products and quantities

get.summary: List price lists with filtering and pagination
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of price lists with optional filtering by search text, currency, and status.

post.description: Create a new price list with validation for date ranges and name uniqueness.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific price list.

put.description: Update price list information including name, dates, currency, and default status.

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of items in a specific price list with product details.

post.description: Add a new product to a price list with pricing information.
Calculate the final price for a product including any surcharge percentage.

get.description: Determine the status of a price list based on start and end dates.

post.description: Validate that a start and end date range is valid for a price list.

get.description: Check if a price list is expiring within a specified number of days.
Get the current price for a specific product, optionally for a specific customer and date.

post.description: Get current prices for multiple products, optionally for a specific customer and date.

get.description: Get all price list items for a specific product across all price lists.

post.description: Calculate subtotal, tax amount, and grand total for an order with line items.
Validate if a requested price for a product is within acceptable ranges.

get.description: Get all price lists that are currently active for a specific date.

post.description: Format a numeric amount as a currency string.

get.summary: List price lists with filtering and pagination
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of price lists with optional filtering by search text, currency, and status.

post.description: Create a new price list with validation for date ranges and name uniqueness.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific price list.

put.description: Update price list information including name, dates, currency, and default status.

delete.description: Delete a price list after validating that it is not referenced by existing orders.

put.description: Set a specific price list as the default price list for the organization.

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of items in a specific price list with product details.

post.description: Add a new product to a price list with pricing information.

put.description: Update pricing information for a specific item in a price list.

delete.description: Remove a product from a price list.

post.summary: Bulk add products to price list
post.description: Add multiple products to a price list with various pricing methods including copy from another list, markup, or fixed pricing.

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive statistics about price lists, products, and pricing coverage.

post.summary: Calculate dynamic pricing for multiple items
post.description: Calculate the final price for multiple products based on their pricing in active price lists.
Validate the pricing information for multiple items in a price list.

post.summary: Bulk update prices for a price list
post.description: Update multiple price list items in a single price list with new pricing information.

get.description: Get pricing tier information and applicable price lists for a specific customer.

post.summary: Calculate weight-based pricing for gas cylinders
post.description: Calculate price using weight-based formula: netGasWeight_kg  gasPricePerKg + depositAmount + tax

get.summary: Get deposit rate for cylinder capacity
get.description: Retrieve the current deposit rate for a specific cylinder capacity

post.description: Calculate comprehensive order total including gas charges, deposits, and taxes for multiple items

post.summary: Calculate final price with enhanced pricing methods
post.description: Calculate final price supporting per_unit, per_kg, flat_rate, and tiered pricing methods

post.summary: Calculate pricing based on order flow (Outright vs Refill/Exchange)
post.description: Calculate pricing according to document: Outright = Gas Fill + Cylinder Deposit, Refill/Exchange = Gas Fill only with auto-generated empty return credit

post.summary: Calculate empty return credit for cylinder returns
post.description: Calculate credit amount for returning empty cylinders (negative price)
Validate that product variants have proper pricing for different scenarios (FULL, EMPTY, FULL-XCH, FULL-OUT)

post.summary: Example pricing calculation for specific product
post.description: Calculate pricing for all scenarios (outright, refill, exchange, pickup) for a specific product to demonstrate the complete pricing system.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of deposit rates with filtering options

post.description: Create a new deposit rate for a specific cylinder capacity

put.description: Update an existing deposit rate

delete.description: Delete a deposit rate (soft delete by setting end date)

get.summary: Get deposit rate for specific capacity
get.description: Retrieve the current deposit rate for a specific cylinder capacity

post.description: Update multiple deposit rates at once with optional end-dating of current rates

get.description: Retrieve the current deposit balance for a customer with optional cylinder breakdown
Retrieve the deposit transaction history for a customer with filtering and pagination

post.description: Charge cylinder deposits to a customer account when cylinders are delivered
Process cylinder deposit refunds when cylinders are returned, with condition-based deductions

get.description: Retrieve information about cylinders currently held by a customer
Retrieve a paginated list of all deposit transactions with comprehensive filtering

post.description: Calculate the refund amount for cylinder returns based on condition and depreciation
Validate a deposit rate for conflicts and business rules
Validate if a customer is eligible for a deposit refund
Manually adjust a customer deposit balance with proper authorization

get.description: Retrieve the complete audit trail for a deposit transaction
Generate a summary report of deposit transactions for a specified period
Generate a report of outstanding cylinder deposits by customer
Get a list of users with filtering options

post.description: Create a new user account using the proper auth registration flow

get.description: Get a list of users with driver role

post.description: Validate user data for duplicates
Check if user email exists in the system
Reset user password after validating email exists (no token required)

get.description: Get a single user by their ID

delete.description: Delete or deactivate a user account

put.description: Update user information

post.description: Change password for a user
